title: pytorch-ignite issue:AttributeError: type object 'torch.distributed.ReduceOp' has no attribute 'BAND'
body:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./interact.py", line 16, in <module>
    from train import SPECIAL_TOKENS, build_input_from_segments, add_special_tokens_
  File "/home/vikas/Desktop/chatbot_thesis/approaches/Hugging_face/train.py", line 14, in <module>
    from ignite.engine import Engine, Events
  File "/home/vikas/anaconda3/envs/hugging/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ignite/__init__.py", line 2, in <module>
    import ignite.distributed
  File "/home/vikas/anaconda3/envs/hugging/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ignite/distributed/__init__.py", line 1, in <module>
    from ignite.distributed.auto import *
  File "/home/vikas/anaconda3/envs/hugging/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ignite/distributed/auto.py", line 10, in <module>
    from ignite.distributed import utils as idist
  File "/home/vikas/anaconda3/envs/hugging/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ignite/distributed/utils.py", line 8, in <module>
    from ignite.distributed.comp_models import (
  File "/home/vikas/anaconda3/envs/hugging/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ignite/distributed/comp_models/__init__.py", line 2, in <module>
    from ignite.distributed.comp_models.native import has_native_dist_support
  File "/home/vikas/anaconda3/envs/hugging/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ignite/distributed/comp_models/native.py", line 22, in <module>
    class _NativeDistModel(ComputationModel):
  File "/home/vikas/anaconda3/envs/hugging/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ignite/distributed/comp_models/native.py", line 305, in _NativeDistModel
    "AND": dist.ReduceOp.BAND,
AttributeError: type object 'torch.distributed.ReduceOp' has no attribute 'BAND'
